ygData.subject: Re: HARMSHIELD what lvl?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/8/99 1:03:28 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... It is a research ONLY level 20 spell. It gives the user 18 seconds on invulnerability (NOTHING
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/8/99 1:03:28 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
dualdocs@... writes:

> I've seen this spell listed on level 20 spell lists several places but I
> have never seen it on a vendor. Is it research only? Is it better than
> banshee aura or shieldskin?

It is a research ONLY level 20 spell.

It gives the user 18 seconds on invulnerability (NOTHING can ham you, though
you can be stunned) During that 18 seconds you cannot cast a spell. As far
as I know, there are no required casting components.

There is a long regen time between casts, and when you first memorize it
(though I MAY have hit a bug... I zoned while it was still on, and it was
available immediately again...)

I used it last night to test if I could bank in a town and it saved my life :)
